languages.text: Вольный Торговец лично руководит эвакуацией. "Несите плазмо-пилы!", "Раненых к выходу!" — вторят офицеры командам капитана. Когда сервочереп, следующий за Торговцем, приближается к дверям, те поддаются плазмо-пилам и падают наружу. Последним мостик покидает Вольный Торговец.

traits.locale_text: Вольный Торговец лично руководит эвакуацией. "Достать противогазы!", "Несите плазмо-пилы!", "Раненых к выходу!" — вторят офицеры командам капитана. Через время двери поддаются, и команда почти полным составом покидает мостик. Последним выходит Вольный Торговец.

languages.text: The Rogue Trader personally oversees the evacuation. "Bring the plasma cutters!" "Get the wounded to the exit!" The officers repeat {mf|his|her} orders. When the servo-skull following the Rogue Trader reaches the doors, they fall to the plasma cutters and crumble outward. The Rogue Trader is the last to leave the bridge.
languages.original_text: Вольный Торговец лично руководит эвакуацией. "Несите плазмо-пилы!", "Раненых к выходу!" — вторят офицеры командам капитана. Когда сервочереп, следующий за Торговцем, приближается к дверям, те поддаются плазмо-пилам и падают наружу. Последним мостик покидает Вольный Торговец.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader personally oversees the evacuation. "Bring the plasma cutters!" "Get the wounded to the exit!" The officers are repeating {mf|his|her} orders. When the servo-skull, which is following the Rogue Trader, gets to the door, they fall to the plasma cutters and crumble outward. The Rogue Trader is the last to leave the bridge.

The Rogue Trader personally oversees the evacuation. "Bring the plasma cutters!" "Get the wounded to the exit!" The officers are repeating {mf|his|her} orders. When the servo-skull, which is following the Rogue Trader, gets to the door, they fall to the plasma cutters and crumble outward. The Rogue Trader is the last to leave the bridge.

When the servo-skull following the Rogue Trader reaches the doors, they fall to the plasma cutters and crumble outward. The Rogue Trader is the last to leave the bridge.

The Rogue Trader personally oversees the evacuation. "Bring the plasma cutters!" "Get the wounded to the exit!" The officers repeat {mf|his|her} orders. When the servo-skull following the Rogue Trader reaches the doors, they fall to the plasma cutters and crumble outward. The Rogue Trader is the last to leave the bridge.

The Rogue Trader personally oversees the evacuation. "Bring the plasma cutters!" "Get the wounded to the exit!" The officers repeat {mf|his|her} orders. When the servo-skull following the Rogue Trader reaches the doors, they fall to the plasma cutters and crumble outward. The Rogue Trader is the last to leave the bridge.

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente supervisa personalmente la evacuación. «¡Traed los sopletes de plasma!». «¡Llevad a los heridos a la salida!». Los oficiales se hacen eco de sus órdenes. Cuando el servocráneo que sigue a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente llega a las puertas, ceden ante los sopletes de plasma y se desmoronan hacia afuera. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente no sale hasta que el resto las ha cruzado.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader personally oversees the evacuation. "Bring the plasma cutters!" "Get the wounded to the exit!" The officers repeat {mf|his|her} orders. When the servo-skull following the Rogue Trader reaches the doors, they fall to the plasma cutters and crumble outward. The Rogue Trader is the last to leave the bridge.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente supervisa personalmente la evacuación. «¡Traed los sopletes de plasma!». «¡Llevad a los heridos a la salida!». Los oficiales se hacen eco de sus órdenes. Cuando el servocráneo que sigue a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente llega a las puertas, ceden ante los sopletes de plasma y se desmoronan hacia afuera. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente no sale hasta que el resto las ha cruzado.

languages.text: 行商浪人亲自指挥起了疏散工作。“把等离子切割器拿过来！”“把伤员带到出口那边！”军官们按照{mf|他|她}的命令行事。当跟随行商浪人的伺服头骨到达门前时，大门在等离子切割器的烈焰之下轰然倒塌。最后一位离开舰桥的是行商浪人。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader personally oversees the evacuation. "Bring the plasma cutters!" "Get the wounded to the exit!" The officers repeat {mf|his|her} orders. When the servo-skull following the Rogue Trader reaches the doors, they fall to the plasma cutters and crumble outward. The Rogue Trader is the last to leave the bridge.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人亲自指挥起了疏散工作。“把等离子切割器拿过来！”“把伤员带到出口那边！”军官们按照{mf|他|她}的命令行事。当跟随行商浪人的伺服头骨到达门前时，大门在等离子切割器的烈焰之下轰然倒塌。最后一位离开舰桥的是行商浪人。

languages.text: 自由開拓者が自ら避難を指揮した。「プラズマカッターを持って来い！」「負傷者を出口まで送り届けろ！」士官達はその命令を繰り返す。自由開拓者を追ってきたサーヴォスカルが扉の前まで来ると、扉はプラズマカッターに敗れ、外側へと崩れ落ちた。自由開拓者が最後にブリッジを離れる。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader personally oversees the evacuation. "Bring the plasma cutters!" "Get the wounded to the exit!" The officers repeat {mf|his|her} orders. When the servo-skull following the Rogue Trader reaches the doors, they fall to the plasma cutters and crumble outward. The Rogue Trader is the last to leave the bridge.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者が自ら避難を指揮した。「プラズマカッターを持って来い！」「負傷者を出口まで送り届けろ！」士官達はその命令を繰り返す。自由開拓者を追ってきたサーヴォスカルが扉の前まで来ると、扉はプラズマカッターに敗れ、外側へと崩れ落ちた。自由開拓者が最後にブリッジを離れる。

languages.text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} überwacht persönlich die Evakuierung. "Bringt die Plasmaschneider!" "Bringt die Verwundeten zum Ausgang!" Die Offiziere wiederholen seine Befehle. Als der Servoschädel, der {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} folgt, die Türen erreicht, stürzt er auf die Plasmaschneider und zerfällt. {mf|Der Freihändler ist der|Die Freihändlerin ist die} Letzte, {mf|der|die} die Brücke verlässt.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader personally oversees the evacuation. "Bring the plasma cutters!" "Get the wounded to the exit!" The officers repeat {mf|his|her} orders. When the servo-skull following the Rogue Trader reaches the doors, they fall to the plasma cutters and crumble outward. The Rogue Trader is the last to leave the bridge.

languages.text: {name} supervise personnellement l'évacuation. « Apportez les découpeurs à plasma ! » « Conduisez les blessés à la sortie ! » Les officiers répètent ses ordres, et les portes découpées s'effondrent juste au moment où s'approche le servocrâne suivant {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, qui est {mf|le dernier|la dernière} à quitter le pont.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader personally oversees the evacuation. "Bring the plasma cutters!" "Get the wounded to the exit!" The officers repeat {mf|his|her} orders. When the servo-skull following the Rogue Trader reaches the doors, they fall to the plasma cutters and crumble outward. The Rogue Trader is the last to leave the bridge.

traits.locale_text: {name} supervise personnellement l'évacuation. « Apportez les découpeurs à plasma ! » « Conduisez les blessés à la sortie ! » Les officiers répètent ses ordres, et les portes découpées s'effondrent juste au moment où s'approche le servocrâne suivant {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, qui est {mf|le dernier|la dernière} à quitter le pont.

languages.text: Hür Tacir tahliyeyi bizzat yönetiyor. "Plazma kesicileri getirin!" "Yaralıları çıkışa götürün!" Subaylar, emirleri tekrarlıyor. Hür Tacir'i izleyen hizmelet yaklaştığında anda kapılar, plazma kesicilere yenik düşüp dışarı doğru devriliyor. Köprüden son ayrılansa Hür Tacir oluyor.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader personally oversees the evacuation. "Bring the plasma cutters!" "Get the wounded to the exit!" The officers repeat {mf|his|her} orders. When the servo-skull following the Rogue Trader reaches the doors, they fall to the plasma cutters and crumble outward. The Rogue Trader is the last to leave the bridge.

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir tahliyeyi bizzat yönetiyor. "Plazma kesicileri getirin!" "Yaralıları çıkışa götürün!" Subaylar, emirleri tekrarlıyor. Hür Tacir'i izleyen hizmelet yaklaştığında anda kapılar, plazma kesicilere yenik düşüp dışarı doğru devriliyor. Köprüden son ayrılansa Hür Tacir oluyor.
